character.age: 25 years old with a youthful appearance
character.background: Born into a poor but loving family, I was always drawn to the world of adventure and exploration. As a child, I would often sneak out of my home to explore the nearby woods and forests.

physical_appearance.hair_color: Dark Brown with subtle hints of auburn

character.place_of_birth: Brindlemark, a small village on the outskirts of the Elven Kingdoms
